name: DFJ VinaCapital
overview: DFJ VinaCapital has both the investing experience and the local market knowledge to help their investee companies traverse the operating environment in Vietnam. They are a part of the VinaCapital family of funds, as well as a member of the Draper Fisher Jurvetson (DFJ) network. VinaCapital is Vietnamâ€™s leading asset manager, with over 200 companies under management. DFJ is the worldâ€™s premier venture capital network with over 600 portfolio companies funded globally. These extensive networks enable DFJ VinaCapital to provide a rich source of support and partnerships for investee companies.
